title: Tomogram reconstruction and sub-tomogram averaging
protocol_description: Dose-weighted motion-corrected images were exported for tomographic reconstruction by weighted back-projection in AreTomo and 4-times binned. Averaging was performed in RELION with 1,284 particles, I1 symmetry, using a 60-Ã…-low-pass-filtered map of the encapsulin scaffold (PDB 6X8M) as a reference.
